content: In Florida, a Quinnipiac University poll released Wednesday showed Biden leading Trump by a 10-point margin, 52 to 42, among voters 65 and older the latest poll showing Trump losing ground with seniors in key battlegrounds. In 2016, exit polls showed Trump wi… [+7515 chars]
source.name: The Washington Post

author: Edith M. Lederer | AP
title: UN envoy: Israeli annexation can destroy Mideast peace hopes
description: The U—N— Mideast envoy is warning that Israeli moves to annex parts of the West Bank and accelerate settlement expansion, combined with the coronavirus pandemic’s devastating impact, could ignite Israeli-Palestinian conflict and “destroy any hope of peace.”
content:
He urged Israelis and Palestinians to support U.N. Secretary-General Antonio Guterres call for a global cease-fire to all conflicts to tackle the pandemic.

source.name: The Washington Post

author: Paul Waldman
title: Happy Hour Roundup
description: Our nightly wrap-up of news and opinion.
content:
